introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.body: Welcome to KampanYES. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you use our app and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

information_we_collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
information_we_collect.body: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows:

identity.label: Identity Data:
identity.text: includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier

contact.label: Contact Data:
contact.text: includes email address and telephone numbers

technical.label: Technical Data:
technical.text: includes internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, operating system and platform

usage.label: Usage Data:
usage.text: includes information about how you use our app and services

marketing.label: Marketing and Communications Data:
marketing.text: includes your preferences in receiving marketing from us and your communication preferences

how_we_use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
how_we_use.body: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:

items.item1: To provide and maintain our Service
items.item2: To notify you about changes to our Service
items.item3: To allow you to participate in interactive features when you choose to do so
items.item5: To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our Service
items.item6: To monitor the usage of our Service
items.item7: To detect, prevent and address technical issues

data_security.title: 4. Data Security
data_security.body: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know.

data_retention.title: 5. Data Retention
data_retention.body: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

your_rights.title: 6. Your Legal Rights
your_rights.body: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to:

items.item1: Request access to your personal data
items.item2: Request correction of your personal data
items.item3: Request erasure of your personal data
items.item4: Object to processing of your personal data
items.item5: Request restriction of processing your personal data
items.item6: Request transfer of your personal data

third_party_links.title: 7. Third-Party Links
third_party_links.body: Our app may include links to third-party websites, plug-ins and applications. Clicking on those links or enabling those connections may allow third parties to collect or share data about you. We do not control these third-party websites and are not responsible for their privacy statements.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.body: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are small files that may include an anonymous unique identifier.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.body: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
